column1: Kata Robata////At the end of our meal
column2: our alarm went off at the house. The waitress (blonde asian gal with dark glasses?) had been very attentive and nice throughout the night
column3: and she came by shortly after and I told her we had to rush out to check on the house. Within 60 seconds
column7: and brought it back. I really appreciated her expediting that for us
column8: and enjoyed the service. My perfect level: Attentive
